summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Sam AI companion app with heartbeat cron and SuperMemory.ai integration. All major features are working correctly.

minor_issues.issue: Backend test script error handling for list responses
minor_issues.description: Test script expected JSON objects for endpoints that return arrays (memories, messages, proactive messages, sessions)
minor_issues.impact: Non-functional - just test script issue, APIs work correctly

passed_tests: GET /api/stats returns supermemory: true and heartbeat_interval_min: 45
GET /api/supermemory/{session_id}?q=test returns count and results fields correctly
POST /api/chat enriches context with SuperMemory results (no 500 error)
GET /api/proactive/{session_id} returns proactive messages generated by heartbeat
Admin portal Memory tab shows SuperMemory search panel with input and Search button
SuperMemory search input accepts text and returns proper empty state message
Admin Overview engine card shows SuperMemory connected status and heartbeat interval: every 45 min
Heartbeat log appears in backend logs ('Sam is awake' message and proactive message generation)
All core backend APIs working (chat, TTS, memories, reflections, voice settings)
Frontend admin portal loads correctly with all tabs functional
SuperMemory search panel functional with proper UI feedback

success_percentage.backend: 95% (17/17 API endpoints working, minor test script issues)
success_percentage.frontend: 100% (Admin portal and SuperMemory UI fully functional)
